nodes.text: Thakitillo was a delicacy which was considered among the finest edible fare in the galaxy.
It consisted of tangy curds which dissolved in the eater's mouth. Members of the Myrkr strike team enjoyed it, though it prompted memories of fallen comrades.

Three opportunistic Squibs trading material to the Killiks during the Swarm War asked Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo to transport crates of green thakitillo, in return for assistance finding their daughter Jaina Solo in the Chiss/Killik war zone.
